author: arnetheduck
content: https://github.com/eth-clients/eth2-networks/issues/84#issuecomment-2124047744 - I used the opportunity to "normalise" the layout of the repository a bit - cc <@199561711278227457> <@412614104222531604>  - in particular, we had duplicate bootstrap and deploy block height files - I presume there's a tool that generates these config directories for testnets, it would be great if it was updated to use this same layout

content: Wouldn't this break other clients that expect a certain file name for enrs?

content: they can update their expectations - ie it's a pointless difference to maintain

content: notably, the old https://github.com/eth-clients/eth2-networks/tree/master/shared/mainnet has this structure without these extra files
